Package io.github.vampirestudios.artifice.api

Interface ArtificeResourcePack.ClientResourcePackBuilder

All Superinterfaces:
ArtificeResourcePack.ResourcePackBuilder
Enclosing interface:
ArtificeResourcePack
@Environment(CLIENT) public static interface ArtificeResourcePack.ClientResourcePackBuilder extends ArtificeResourcePack.ResourcePackBuilder
Passed to resource construction callbacks to register client-side resources.

      @Deprecated default void addItemModel(net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation id, ModelBuilder f)

      Add an item model for the given item ID.
      Parameters:
      id - An item ID, which will be converted into the correct path.
      f - A callback which will be passed a ModelBuilder to create the item model.

    • addTranslations

      default void addTranslations(net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation id, TranslationBuilder f)
      Add a translation file for the given language.
      Parameters:
      id - The namespace and language code of the desired language.
      f - A callback which will be passed a TranslationBuilder to create the language file.

    • addLanguage

      void addLanguage(net.minecraft.client.resources.language.LanguageInfo def)
      Add a custom language. Translations must be added separately with addTranslations(net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation, io.github.vampirestudios.artifice.api.builder.assets.TranslationBuilder).
      Parameters:
      def - A LanguageInfo for the desired language.

    • addLanguage

      void addLanguage(String code, String region, String name, boolean rtl)
      Add a custom language. Translations must be added separately with addTranslations(net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation, io.github.vampirestudios.artifice.api.builder.assets.TranslationBuilder).
      Parameters:
      code - The language code for the custom language (i.e. en_us). Must be all lowercase alphanum / underscores.
      region - The name of the language region (i.e. United States).
      name - The name of the language (i.e. English).
      rtl - Whether the language is written right-to-left instead of left-to-right.

    • setVisible

      void setVisible()
      Mark this pack as visible (will be shown in the resource packs menu).
